Package Classes.Balls

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorBalls
    The ColorBalls class represents a colored billiard ball.
    FrictionBalls
    The FrictionBall class represents a billiard ball which slows down when moving.
    NumberedBall
    The NumberedBall class represents a billiard ball with a number.
    PulsatingBall
    The PulsatingBall class represents a billiard ball which pulsates (in size).
    TraceBall
    The TraceBall class represents a billiard ball with a trace behind it.
